column1: English Sent: Earth scientists have attempted to explain the formation of physical features with the help of some theories based on certain evidences.
Hindi Tansl: kuCa pramANoM para AXAriwa sixXAMwoM kI sahAyawA se BUgarBaSAswriyoM ne ina BOwika AkqwiyoM ke nirmANa kI vyAKyA karane kI koSiSa kI hE.
Anu Translation:  saMsArika vEjFAnika kuCa sAkRya para AXAriwa kuCa sixXAnwoM kI sahAyawA se BOwika_wawva aiSeRawAeM kA suvyavasWiwa krama samaJAne ke prayAsa_kara cuke hEM
